reviews.sentence: nice stay. nice hotel just five minutes walk from city centar. rooms are clean and breakfast is awsome. From hotel you can walk to the Aupark shoping mall and UFO tower. 10 min. Hotel staff is very friendly and helpful.

Poorly kept Hotel. The hotel is located centrally. but that s the only thing good part. Its a old hotel and is poorly kept not much effort has been made to keep it up with time. My room carpet was ugly and stained not the ones that you would want to walk barefoot. The breakfast room was same as well with torn up upholstery on the chairs. Check out was painful as well with no card terminals working. whole process took 20 mins. I travel to Bratislava for work almost every week never to return to this place for sure.

Good hotel good location. This hotel was perfectly fine good rooms great location central to everything and nice facilities spa and gym and pool looked very good and the food at the breakfast buffet was plentiful and good quality as you alway get at a park inn. I looked at the Radison also but this hotel was half the price with better facilities. Definitely stay again.

Good location. We stayed for one night and apreceiated the exelent location. Parking right outside has has a very good gym. Rooms are a little small but clean and nice. Breakfast is ok. The hotel gives you what you need for a night but have no charming factor.

Good hotel. Stayed for 3 nights in July. Good hotel very good location for holiday. Very near from hystorical center and castle. Good transport conections. Room ok but the A C not working properly. Clen room and bathroom. Toilet was separate from bathroom. Good buffet breakfast. I will definitely recommend it.

an excelant hotel to stay in. the hotel is one of the best in Bratislava if you want something right in the old town. I can not fault the hotel in anyway from the really friendly and helpful staff the rooms are really clean and comfortable. the pool and gym facilities are excellent and the breakfast and bar food is one of the best. this is a truly great place to stay. I can not wait to return.

Average Hotel below its potential. Went there for a Bratislava Weekend Trip. First our booking through the Homepage was not available at the Desk and it took 30 minutes to clarify. Staff was very polite and helpful with that. Then my room door card did not work and it took me 3 further visits at the desk to get a new card. The window of my friends room could not ne closed and he had to change the room after one night because the discothek was too loud. My air condition did not work and the room was too warmdo not get me wrong only little issues and staff really willing to help. But this is not enough for a Hotel of this category in this Location.

Convenient Location and Friendly Staff. We stayed in Business Friendly Room size was okay at a good rate clean and quiet over looking the Danube perfect breakfast with much choices. Dinner was good at hotel restaurant. All Staff were very helpful and polite. Easy walk to everywhere in Old Town.

My pre christmas stay. It was terribly noisy there were people hanging around outside reception shouting from 2 am til 5 am. So sleep was at a minimum. There were no tea or coffee making facility which was disappointing. Apart from that room servis was good and also gym I liked. I satayed here ť years ago for a new year party and had nice memories. It was called Hotel Danube then and I ca nt understand why the prefix PARK is there.
Great place but old rooms and not clean. Has sauna and a small swimming pool fitness with gym free od.

Not Impressed. Overall I have to say I was not impressed with our rooms firstly the wifi was non existent even the late night receptionist could not get it to work with the assistance of a router in the room. Yet you walk out of the room towards the lift area and bingo the wifi is perfect unfortunately with friends staying in other hotels its was n’t what you want to keep in contact with them. The wifi on the ground floor was perfect it would appear our rooms 2 on the 3rd floor facing the hotel courtyard must of been so far away from the signal as it was pretty much non existent yet friends staying on the same floor facing the river had no issues what so ever. Out next problem appeared to be the shower in our room it appeared to have a mind of its own. It could n’t decide weather it was a shower or a bath again this was reported to reception but the problem without any real success again it was good job we had 2 adjoining rooms as 1 room the shower worked fine and the other had a mind of its own. As many other reviews have covered the breakfast was very good also the location is ideal for sightseeing transport Sadly our stay here was spoilt by the lack of internet wifi very important when trying to keep in touch with friends staying in other hotels and the temperamental shower in our room.

Higher advertised than reality. Excellent location but do not get fooled by the hotel stars or by the pictures. I booked a junior suite for the family. I was asked to pay in advance for two nights. The room was awful and I have asked my money back. Not possible. Nobody moved at 6 pm without the big Boss. Next morning I have asked for checkout and refund for the second night. It took me almost an hour to convince them to refund me. The junior suite looked like a dorm room with cheap sheets and some weird covers on top. Windows not completely closed bathroom not very clean. The sleep was bad due to very poor beds cold and general look of the rooms. Pros very good breakfast and location.

High quality hotel in a very good location of Bratislava. I was in the hotel for 3 nights at the end of January 2016. I was satisfied with everything the breakfast was very delicious and we had a lot meals to choose from them. The fitness room is very large and the guests of the hotel always get a clean towel for free to use by workout. I also used the wellness island of the hotel which is very comfortable. Maybe the water of the jacuzi was a bit cold at the second evening but it is not a big problem. The room was also clean the bed was comfortable. The beautiful old town of Bratislava begins in about 300 meter and if you are lucky you can get a room with the view of the castle.

This Hotel Is Closed. The Park Inn Danube is closedi do not know if it is a permanent closure or not als I can say is we were booked into this hotel and upon arrival this hotel was just a shell with just the structure of the building is tact. We were very lucky as the staff in the the next hotel told us it had closed down. We had to phone Alpharoms up and ended up in the Radison Blu hotel. If you have booked this hotel get in contact with the hotel booking company or site you used and tell them as it will save you the stress we had. Located on Rybné Námestie and very easy to get to from tram stop Most SNP walk along for a minute Rázusovo Nábražie and take a left onto Rybné Námestie. Nearest Tram Stop. Tram Stop Nový Most04 10 22 17.
Horrible reconstruction of hotel very cheap design not suitable for center of the Old Town. Rather destroy all building because this is big shame.
one star for not completely razing the building down. Otherwise this renovation is an utter disaster and a disgrace to the architects of the original building.
Please do nt go here this hotel ripped a huge scar in look of Bratislava downtown.

This hotel is actually closed because the recent refurbishing does not meet local city regulations. The hotel owner is refusing to comply and instead is funding attack ads threatening legal action that would bankrupt the city. It is therefore unclear when it can actually open. By booking a room at this hotel in the near future you are at risk of having your reservation canceled. You are also aiding unethical business behavior.
Value for money. Maybe the best hotel if you go on Christmas period. Ony some steps away from the bigest christmas market and the atraction of tje city.

New Hotel Very Noisy. Although the hotel is quite new and the room looks nice I had a bad experience. I was lucky to sleep close to the elevator on the 2nd floor. All the noise from the Club on the ground floor reaches this room. I asked for another room twice but no luck. Due to the bad sleeping and service experience I can not recommend this hotel. If you consider to book this hotel stay away from the elevator area.

This recent refurbishing of this hotel does not meet local city regulations. The hotel owner promised to ensure compliance by Nov 1 201 8 but has made no attempt to do so. The hotel owner is systematically breaking rules making false promises and generally behaving unethically eg funding attack ads in the past threatening legal action that would bankrupt the city. It is not surprising given that the owner is a former government minister ousted in the 90s due to a privatization scandal and Russian capital of unknown provenance. Big failure of due diligence by the Park Inn brand. The city may close down the hotel in the coming weeks. By booking a room at this hotel in the near future you are at risk of having your reservation canceled. You are also enabling and rewarding unethical business behavior. Please be a responsible consumer and go elsewhere.

The hotel is nice if you demand the rooms looking outside because the rooms looking to the facilities yard have boring lifeless view. Breakfast is good no Chef that cooks oumlet with chopped vegetables only the basic oumlet without anything but eggs. The parking costs 27 € per day. The parking has underground Tesla charging Type 2 stations. Tesla Supercharger is located in a mall 10 minutes from the hotel. The location is great 10 minutes from both big malls in Bratislava. Design is fine but the TVs in the rooms are small related to high class hotels. Internet Wi Fi was disconnecting ALL THE TIME even though I complained twice it did not improveand I had a flagship smartphone and laptop that worked elsewhere. One day a cleaning lady entered the room just like that when we were naked. Staff should be educated for privacy ALWAYS knock on doors and not enter with their Master key door Like a Boss. Anyway the rooms were properly priced just ask for a river view or something. Air Conditioner barely worked and the windows can not be opened only partially.

Very rude staff at Mow bar. Came with a big group and there was a lot of room in the bar. Staff was not interested in seating us together there was room and were very slow or not interested in serving drinks and snacks. Told us we were bad customers and we decided to leave.

Terrible experience in a nice hotel. It was a catastrophic stay for us and I really expected so much more from a hotel with 4 stars that belongs to the Radison Group. It started with the booking I booked a Junior Suite online and checked with the hotel reception by phone to make sure I really get this room with the nice river view. When we arrived it turned out that the hotel was overboked and we will only get a standard room of course without river view. We did not accept that so they upgraded us to an apartment of course without river view. When we enter the room we were quite in shock there was used linen on the sofa the bathroom not clean and LOTS of hair in the bed and on the pillows. We complained and the staff replaced the linen while we were out for a beer. When we came back the room was more clean but in the bed and on the pillows there was still plenty of hair. No manager available in the night shift so we complained next morning and got a new room and guess what LOTS of hair in the bed and on the pillows. we are talking about 10 15 hairs of different size and color on each pillow. Easily visible. How can you miss thatThis hotel definitifely has a problem with the cleaning and with the management. After we complained again the manager promised to fix it this time for good we got new linen on the bed but again with lots of hair on it. The management finally gave up and the celaning staff did not even bother looking at it. Just a reminder for the hotel management you do not get your stars for a clean bed. A clean bed is the MINIMUM requirement for every hotel even with zero stars. The breakfast was quite nice but even on sunday at 930 of the clock they did not care to refill things. Salad was out Ketchup not available rolls just empty eggs only available from time to time. You have to ask several times untiul they find something in the kitchen. But only if you are lucky. Very strange I have never seen something like this in a 4 star hotel. The only positive experience in this hotel was the Spa area which includes a nice Jacuzi a fitness area large swimming pool and 3 saunas. The Spa staff is polite and competent as well as some of the reception staff. We have no intention to go back to this hotel there are better choices in Bratislava. Next to the cleaning problem we were very disappointed by the management of the hotel. If a guest complains about very visible and present cleaning issues 3 times you should really make sure there is no 4th time to complain. Comenzó con la reserva reservé una Junior Suite en línea y verifiqué con la recepción del hotel por teléfono para asegurarme de que realmente obtuviera esta habitación con la hermosa vista del río. Cuando legamos. resultó que el hotel estaba sobrecargado y solo obtendríamos una habitación estándar por supuesto sin vista al río. No aceptamos eso así que nos pasaron a un apartamento por supuesto sin vista al río. Cuando entramos en la habitación estábamos bastante en shock había ropa de cama usada en el sofá el baño no estaba limpio y MUCHOS pelos en la cama y en las almohadas. Nos quejamos y el personal remplazó la ropa mientras estábamos fuera por una cerveza. Cuando regresamos la habitación estaba más limpia pero en la cama y en las almohadas todavía había mucho pelo. No hay ningún gerente disponible en el turno de la noche. así que nos quejamos a la mañana siguiente y conseguimos una nueva habitación y adivinen qué. MUCHO pelo en la cama y en las almohadas. ¡. Estamos hablando de 10 15 pelos de diferente tamaño y color en cada almohada. Fácilmente visible. ¿. Cómo puedes extrañar eso. Este hotel definitivamente tiene un problema con la limpieza y con la administración. Después de que nos quejamos nuevamente el gerente prometió areglarlo esta vez para siempre tenemos ropa nueva en la cama pero otra vez con mucho pelo. La gerencia finalmente se rindió y el personal de celaning ni siquiera se molestó en mirarlo. Solo un recordatorio para la gerencia del hotel. no consigues tus estrelas para una cama limpia. Una cama limpia es el requisito MÍNIMO de cada hotel incluso con cero estrelas. El desayuno era bastante bueno pero incluso los domingos a las 930 no les importaba relenar las cosas. La ensalada estaba fuera el ketchup no estaba disponible los rollos estaban vacíos los huevos solo estaban disponibles de vez en cuando. Tienes que preguntar varias veces hasta que encuentren. algo en la cocina. Pero solo si tienes suerte. Muy extraño nunca había visto algo así en un hotel de 4 estrelas. La única experiencia positiva en este hotel fue la zona de Spa que incluye un agradable jacuzi una zona de gimnasio una gran piscina y 3 saunas. El personal del spa es educado y competente al igual que parte del personal de la recepción. No tenemos intención de volver a este hotel hay mejores opciones en Bratislava. Al lado del problema de la limpieza nos sentimos muy decepcionados por la gestión del hotel. Si un huésped se queja 3 veces de problemas de limpieza muy visibles y presentes realmente debe asegurarse de que no haya 4ta vez para quejarse. ¡ Resuelve el problema de tu cabelo es asqueroso.
Great hotel and locationBreakfast could have been much better for a hotel I ’d this standard. Orange and apple juice were all watered down each morning and rashers. eggs were cold.

Overnight in Bratislava. Location is perfect. Check in excellent. Room is spacious enough equipped with all a businessman needs. I expected to find disposable flipflops. Internet signal is very good. Swimming pool did not work although I booked this hotel for this reason.

my experience to this hotel. It is very expensive more than in Vienna. Very poor breakfast no cold water in the breakfast some days are missing eggs too. Also to go to the room is to long based in long corridors because this Hotel has only three elevators in the same place of the hotel just in one side. Otherwise the hotel is in center of downtown it is closer to the Center MNP bus station. If you like to go early during weekend you can not have breakfast erlier than 070 of the clock. Also WiFi in the loby is better then in hotels room. In the room WiFi is very poor.

The service and over all stay was pleasant. However parking was an issue. When making a reservation it was indicated that parking was available. The unpleasant surprise was Euro 320 cost of parking over night. The cost was disproportionate to the cost of the hotel. It would be advisable to disclose the cost of parking up front to avoid perhaps unpleasant surprise. Of cause it may lead to some lost of bookings.

The hotel is very nice and recently renovated. So why only 3 stars. Well 1 it is not a hotel for business travelers there is no work space ans no chair you can use on the small self under the TV 2 worst you always have to take the elevator as stairs are for emergency use and you go directly to the street. There is however a nicely equipped gym and sauna. Thus a good hotel for a holiday trip but not if you have to do some work in the room.
